returnInfo.Name: volume
returnInfo.Description: Object containing information about the newly created volume.

returnInfo.Name: volumeID
returnInfo.Description: VolumeID for the newly created volume.

documentation: CreateVolume allows you to create a new (empty) volume on the cluster. As soon as the volume creation is complete, the volume is available for connection via iSCSI.Volumes created without specified QoS values use the Default values listed in the QoS table. You can view default values for a volume by using the GetDefaultQoS method.

params.Name: name
params.Description: Name of the volume access group (may be user-specified). Not required to be unique, but recommended. May be 1 to 64 characters in length.

params.Name: accountID
params.Description: AccountID for the owner of this volume.

params.Name: totalSize
params.Description: Total size of the volume, in bytes. Size is rounded up to the nearest 1MB size.

params.Name: enable512e
params.Description:
true: The volume provides 512-byte sector emulation.
false: 512e emulation is not enabled.

params.Name: attributes
params.Description: Total attribute size must be less than 1000B, or 1KB, including JSON formatting characters.

params.Name: qos
params.Description: Initial quality of service settings for this volume. Default values are used if none are specified. For defaults, see Quality of Service (QoS).Valid settings are:minIOPS maxIOPS			burstIOPS

name: CreateVolume
